data.name: TAISHO x ALICE original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This original soundtrack contains songs and BGM that color the world of "TAISHO x ALICE".
It contains not only the opening and ending themes of the main story (both in full version), but also the arranged versions of the opening songs of each episode, 7 songs and 16 BGMs in total!

* The theme song "Kagami no kuni no Symphony" from "TAISHO x ALICE HEADS & TAILS" is not included.
* This is not a digital version of the CD "TAISHO x ALICE original Soundtrack - Kagami no kuni no Symphony -".
